document.forum_title: San Francisco Chronicle - Bay Area news, sports, tech, food - San Francisco Chronicle
document.discussion_title: How Fitbit and others have the pulse of health research
document.topic_text: Photo: Amy Osborne, Special To The Chronicle UCSF prostate cancer patient Joe Casserly (right) wears his Fitbit as he walks with his partner, Todd Young, to rehearsal for a show they’re in at the Oasis in San Francisco. UCSF prostate cancer patient Joe Casserly (right) wears his Fitbit... When UCSF prostate cancer patient Joe Casserly agreed to participate in a clinical trial, researchers handed him a Fitbit.
